about_the_game:
John Force is a legend in the sport and this pack puts you in the driver's seat with Team Force to further build on this formidable legacy.

The John Force Racing (JFR) Pack loads you up with:

• Alternative paint scheme for the John Force Funny Car
• Alternative paint scheme for the Brittany Force Top Fuel Car
• JFR-inspired vehicle paint scheme
• JFR-inspired parachute
• JFR-inspired design for vehicle hauler
• JFR-inspired Driver’s Suit
detailed_description:
John Force is a legend in the sport and this pack puts you in the driver's seat with Team Force to further build on this formidable legacy.

The John Force Racing (JFR) Pack loads you up with:

• Alternative paint scheme for the John Force Funny Car
• Alternative paint scheme for the Brittany Force Top Fuel Car
• JFR-inspired vehicle paint scheme
• JFR-inspired parachute
• JFR-inspired design for vehicle hauler
• JFR-inspired Driver’s Suit

name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All - John Force Racing Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 @ 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 2700 X @ 3.7GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: John Force is a legend in the sport and this pack puts you in the driver's seat with Team Force to further build on this formidable legacy.
